= Revision 0.6.2 - Release Notice =
26th October 2009

Revision 0.6.2 Addition of a juice-basic-0.6.2.zip and an example site specific file examples/example_extend.js



= Details =

 * *juice-basic-0.6.2.zip* - Contains minimal set of files to get started with Juice.
  * jquery
  * juice
  * example extend.js
  * panels
  * two extentions - extendedbyJuice & GoogleAnalytics

 * *example_extend.js* - Template extension file set the host URI an Google Analytics ID, uncomment and you'll have Juice running
